DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate immediate mechanical hypoalgesic effect neural mobilization asymptomatic subject . We also compare neural glide versus neural stretch see produce great hypoalgesic effect asymptomatic subject .
DOC.detailed_description: Asymptomatic subject randomly allocate three group : neural glide group ; neural stretch group ; placebo group . Each subject receive one treatment session . Outcome measure include bilateral pressure pain threshold measure trigeminal , cervical , tibialis anterior point , assess pre-treatment immediately post-treatment blind assessor . Three-way repeat measure analysis variance use evaluate change pressure pain threshold , group ( experimental control ) between-subjects variable time ( pre- , post-treatment ) side ( dominant , nondominant ) within-subjects variable .
DOC.criteria: Asymptomatic subject meet inclusion criterion 18 30 year old . rheumatologic diseases type cancer , cervical surgery past , whiplash trauma undergo type treatment like physical therapy , manual therapy , osteopathy , chiropraxis , acupuncture last three month . All patient recruit study complain pain localized neck and/or head region . Initial screen accomplish telephone eligible person attend evaluation appointment . development systemic degenerative disease subject symptom depression accord Beck 's questionnaire pain area low back head last 9 month traumatic event past 12 month history neck face pain last 6 month
